titleStmt.title: It is this day ordered by the House of Commons now assembled in Parliament, that the preamble, together with the protestation, which the members of this house made the third of May, shall be forthwith printed
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker ... and by the assigned of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Mercurii: 5 ̊Maii, 1641.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
